gruppe.irc.messageListeners

Interface MessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GlobalMessageListener, PingListener

    public interface MessageListener
    This interface must be implemented by all message listeners to be attached to an IRCConnection object. The method defined by this interface is the method that will be called to notify the listener that a new message is comming from the IRCConnection object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void messageReceived(MessageEvent me)
      Method to be called to notify the listener of a new message from the IRCConnection object.

    • Method Detail

      • messageReceived

        void messageReceived(MessageEvent me)
        Method to be called to notify the listener of a new message from the IRCConnection object.
        Parameters:
        me - a MessageEvent object containing information about the message.
